features: Durable Cast Iron Construction: Made from cast iron for even heat distribution and long-lasting durability.
Non-Stick Coating: Features a PFAS-free non-stick coating for easy food release.
Oven and Dishwasher Safe: Can be used in the oven for baking and in the dishwasher for easy cleaning.
Removable Handle Design: Comes with a removable handle for comfortable use and easy cleaning.
8 Inch Size: Perfect for frying, sauteing, and pan-frying small to medium-sized foods.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Innovative honeycomb bottom design The patented design of the honeycomb base makes it an indispensable tool in the kitchen.Its oil-locking and non-stick properties provide convenience for healthy eating, while even heat transfer ensures premium cooking results.Whether you are a professional chef or a home cooking enthusiast, the honeycomb pot bottom is an ideal choice to make your cooking process easier, healthier and delicious. Ergonomic detachable wooden handle The handle of this pan is ergonomically based with an emphasis on comfort and convenience.The wooden material, detachable design and shape that conforms to the curve of the hand make it not only comfortable to use, but also convenient to store and carry.For those who love to cook, such a handle design will bring them a more pleasant and convenient cooking experience. Anti-rust design, even heat conduction, healthy cooking This base was designed with rust resistance, even heat conduction, smooth flatness and healthy cooking in mind.It not only provides long-lasting performance, but also ensures that ingredients are heated evenly during cooking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Heat evenly and cook like cast iron! Clean up is a breeze. Better than expected! Bought 2 more. I will get back and see how long they perform. So far, I'm very pleased!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fine pan for breakfast
reviews.reviewText: The pan is heavy and solid. It is the perfect for the breakfast omlets and bacon. You can’t cook lunch with the small pan obviously. It heats up good and comes with accessories for the handle. Be sure to maintain it well for long life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing pan A+++
reviews.reviewText: I've been on the hunt for a cooking pan since I moved into my new college apartment. This pan is absolutely fantastic and highly efficient. It arrived in attractive packaging and was a breeze to attach the handle, thanks to the straightforward instructions. It's nonstick, allowing for effortless cooking without needing oil, and it retains its nonstick quality remarkably well. Cleaning is easy. It heats up quite rapidly, allowing speedy cooking. Overall, this pan is amazing A+++!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice and Heavy Duty!!!
reviews.reviewText: These pans are excellent quality and work extremely good. Since they are made of cast iron, we use them like you would a cast iron pan, same care also. My wife REALLY likes this pans!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the fact that it’s non stick and it truly is, but I noticed that over time the anti-stick coat wore out quick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight cast iron
reviews.reviewText: These are a game changer lighter than traditional cast iron with the advantages of modern nonstick coatings. Great heat retention and easy clean ups

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cast iron skillet is great! It’s extremely easy to use and clean. I love that the handle screws off so I can wash it and it’s also better for storage. It came securely packaged and has a great surface for evenly cooking. This is my go to cast iron for making eggs every morning. I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pan on a whim. I’m an experienced cook and have 2 of every type of frying pan. This pan is the best pan I’ve ever used. I wasn’t expecting much as I love my cast irons and carbon steels. With both, you can only fry and must be careful not to cook anything acidic as you will lift the seasoning layer that took so long to establish right off. All that nurturing down the tubes.With this pan you need not worry about that. It requires no seasoning and you can cook anything in it, which means you can use any acidic liquid to deglaze the pan and make a sauce from the pan drippings. Can’t do that in a carbon steel or cast iron pan. They have their place in any well equipped kitchen, but have limitations. The beauty of cast iron and carbon steel is the superior heat induction and even cooking. Also, the ability to withstand quick temperature fluctuations without warping.This pan provides you with the best of both worlds!! It’s cast iron, so heat induction is excellent and no cold spots, which is a huge drawback with almost all nonstick pans. And…this pan is the best nonstick pan I ever used!! Straight out of the box you can fry an egg and it will slide right out of the pan!! I first bought the 10 inch and once I used it, I immediately ordered the 8 &12 inch pans! I now use them almost exclusively! But this pan!! You won’t be disappointed!! Two thumbs up 👍👍
